description: Manage scope access maps for Azure Container Registries.

commands.name: az acr scope-map create
commands.summary: Create a scope map for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr scope-map create -n MyScopeMap -r myregistry --repository hello-world content/write metadata/read --repository hello-world-again content/read --description "Sample scope map."

az acr scope-map create -n MyScopeMap -r myregistry --description "Sample scope map."
  --repository test content/delete content/read content/write metadata/read metadata/write
  --gateway connectedRegistry config/read config/write message/read message/write

commands.name: az acr scope-map delete
commands.summary: Delete a scope map for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr scope-map delete -n MyScopeMap -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr scope-map list
commands.summary: List all scope maps for an Azure Container Registry.

commands.name: az acr scope-map show
commands.summary: Show details and attributes of a scope map for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr scope-map show -n MyScopeMap -r myregistry

commands.name: az acr scope-map update
commands.summary: Update a scope map for an Azure Container Registry.
examples: az acr scope-map update -n MyScopeMap -r myregistry --remove-repo hello-world metadata/read content/read --remove-gateway connectedRegistry message/write
